ruleset.name: Rule set
ruleset.description: Custom PHP Rules check https://phpmd.org/documentation/creating-a-ruleset.html for more information

rule.message: Avoid variables with short names like {0}. Minimum length is {1}.

property.name: minimum
property.description: Minimum length for a variable, property or parameter name

rule.message: Avoid excessively long variable names like {0}. Keep variable name length under {1}.
rule.description: Detects when a field, formal or local variable is declared with a long name.

rule.name: LongClassName
rule.message: Avoid excessively long class names like {0}. Keep class name length under {1}.
rule.description: Detects when classes or interfaces are declared with excessively long names.

property.name: maximum
property.description: The class name length reporting threshold

property.name: subtract-prefixes
property.description: Comma-separated list of prefixes that will not count in the length of the class name. Only the first matching prefix will be subtracted.

property.name: subtract-suffixes
property.description: Comma-separated list of suffixes that will not count in the length of the class name. Only the first matching suffix will be subtracted.
